org.jetel.util.property

Class RefResFlag

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.util.property.RefResFlag

  • public class RefResFlag
extends java.lang.Object
    This object is used to distinguish various type of property referecence resolvinng in the PorpertyRefResolver. Currently are available just two boolean switches - resolve special characters (\n, \r, \t, ...) - resolve ctl statements (`date2str(today(),"dd-MM-yyyy")`)
    See Also:
    PropertyRefResolver

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static RefResFlag ALL_OFF
      Everything is turned off - only parameters are resolved.
      static RefResFlag CTL_EXPRESSIONS_OFF
      Everything is turned off - only special characters are turned on.
      static RefResFlag REGULAR
      Regular resolving type - special characters and ctl expressions are turned on, secure parameters are turned off.
      static RefResFlag SECURE_PARAMATERS
      Everything is turned off - only secure parameters are turned on.
      static RefResFlag SPEC_CHARACTERS_OFF
      Everything is turned off - only ctl expressions are turned on.
      static RefResFlag URL
      Special flag for URL resolution.

    • Field Detail

      • REGULAR

        public static final RefResFlag REGULAR
        Regular resolving type - special characters and ctl expressions are turned on, secure parameters are turned off. Regular parameters are resolved all the time.

      • ALL_OFF

        public static final RefResFlag ALL_OFF
        Everything is turned off - only parameters are resolved.

      • SPEC_CHARACTERS_OFF

        public static final RefResFlag SPEC_CHARACTERS_OFF
        Everything is turned off - only ctl expressions are turned on. Regular parameters are resolved all the time.

      • CTL_EXPRESSIONS_OFF

        public static final RefResFlag CTL_EXPRESSIONS_OFF
        Everything is turned off - only special characters are turned on. Regular parameters are resolved all the time.

      • SECURE_PARAMATERS

        public static final RefResFlag SECURE_PARAMATERS
        Everything is turned off - only secure parameters are turned on. Regular parameters are resolved all the time.

      • URL

        public static final RefResFlag URL
        Special flag for URL resolution. Only ctl expressions and secure parameters are resolved. Regular parameters are resolved all the time.
